pages.text: The stove can be crafted from a furnace and the material which can be either concrete or iron, put these in the Wood Working Table in the order shown to craft one.

There is also a Built-In Oven and separate Cooktop that can be crafted instead. To change the oven variant just change the ingredients to match the counter material. The Cooktop has the Campfire's functionality, while the Oven the Smoker's.
Matching Oven Range Hood are also available, purely decorative for now, they connect to the small wall drawers.
